name: GirlDivers
storyline: Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against an overwhelming alien menace. Command sexy girl soldiers in a rich campaign full of randomly generated challenges, unforgiving enemies, sci-fi gadgets, and heavy firepower. Engaging in lewd punishments and rewards along the way.
summary:
Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against an overwhelming alien menace.
